data.md:MetaData: Nutrients, chlorophyll a and nitrogen uptake rates of site P12 (1993-03-09)

Macronutrient, chlorophyll a and particulate nitrogen and carbon concentrations, and nitrogen uptake rates for the euphotic zone in the NE subarctic Pacific during Canadian JGOFS I (1992-1994) and JGOFS II (1995-1997)
